name: Retro Tetris
description:
Retro Tetris is a tetris clone made in retro style. Game made with lua language and LOVE framework. Installer contains MESA OpenGL implementataion for old hardware compability. Source code is open and licensed under MIT license.

Game use keyboard control like old-school video games for MS-DOS. So, this game use follow keys:

  • ESC - pause game, go to main menu, return from menu items
  • LEFT ARROW - move shape left in one cell
  • RIGHT ARROW - move shape right in one cell
  • UP ARROW - rotate shape and change item in menus
  • DOWN ARROW - move shape down in one cell and change selected item in menu
  • ENTER - choice selected menu item
  • DELETE - clear slot in load or save sub menu
